Package com.google.appinventor.blockseditor.jsonp

Interface Summary
HttpRequestHandler An interface for handling HTTP requests.
HttpServerEventListener Listener interface for receiving events from HttpServer.
 

Class Summary
AsyncJsonpRequestHandler A request handler base class for JSONP requests that must be handled asynchronously.
HttpServer Extremely simple HTTP server.
JsonpRequestHandler A request handler base class for JSONP requests that can be handled synchronously.
Util Utility methods commonly used in client-side HTTP servers.
